page.title: 11Youth Organisations (1)
page.content: When I was in the Brownies I had about 27 badges. We played games & went on lots of trips & camps. We wore a brown woolly hat, dress,belt & a yellow tie. We went out to play & worked for more badges. I've only been in the Guides a year & I've been on one Guide Camp. We wear a blue hat, blouse & skirt,a brown belt,yellow tie & a woggle. I have 3 badges; it is all very interesting but I liked the Brownies best.(J.Gartside). CUBS. Every Tuesday I go to Cubs.We pay 50p subs.We do the grand howl.This is where we all stand round Arkela,she sticks her hands out & we go down into a crouch & say "Arkela, we'll do our best" then we stand up & the duty Sixer stands up & salutes & says"Cubs,do your best"then we go off to our Sixes & our Sixer takes inspection,gives us marks for tidiness & chooses who will go out for parade.(J.Woolley)
